questionTitle: Last night I had a temperature. Today I'm not feeling _____________________________.
This is a very _____________________________ car, cheap and reliable.
Marion speaks very _____________________________ English, hardly distinguishable from a native speaker.
This car is not _____________________________ designed : the back seats are not comfortable.
This chain of restaurants is _____________________________ ­known all over the world.
The student has answered all the questions _____________________________ : he'll get an A.
She looked gorgeous : _____________________________ ­brushed hair, perfect make­up, flashy earrings and fashionable glasses.
I don't speak French _____________________________, which is a pity !
My favourite song is ' I feel _____________________________ ' by James Brown, Wow!!
